oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Systemic research methodology. On the role of values in research in organic farming
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Alrøe, Hugo Fjelsted
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Research methodology and philosophy
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Presentation of systemic research methodology with focus on the role of values in science. With examples from DARCOF.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Alrøe, Hugo Fjelsted (2002) Systemic research methodology. On the role of values in research in organic farming. Speech at: M.Sc.Course on Innovation, management and cross-disciplinary design, Wageningen University, Social Sciences, 28. november 2002.
